title: tips for climbing the ranked ladder
body:
through my journeys so far, i have seen the good, the bad, and the ugly of the LoL community in ranked, and through this i have developed steps to climbing the ladder.
a bit about me:
recently climbed to silver 4 from bronze 3 in little under 3 weeks. 80 games (yes i know it is alot but i got out :D). main rengar, nid but i play a wide diversity of champs.
steps to climbing ranked:
1) always ALWAYS be positive to your team. if your feeling angry take it out elsewhere, not your team or in the chat. be calm, be patient
2) NEVER surrender. in my games the games where my team wanted to surrender, 86% of these i won. i had 2 examples of this happening to me today, 1 as kha'zix and 1 as rengar.
3) adapt your builds to the opponents you face in lane and the fed people on the enemy team. this is essential for winning as you will have more survivability. most of the time, more survivability means more dmg because you have more time to dish it out.
4) learn to play jg or mid/adc. i say this because these roles can carry VERY hard. strong picks for bronze and other low elo are leblanc, zed, leesin (even tho i hate him), rengar, graves, jinx, as these can feed their team or get themselves fed and carry
5) never chase, its a trap
6) never make stupid dragon moves or baron. you will lose those fights even if you're infront
7) only play tanks if you're confident with that champion. they are hard to carry as and sometimes your team doesnt follow you.
8) encourage your team. say gj. say ty. say godd morning/afaternoon/evening in champ select. this makes your team want to communicate more with u
9) always ping when you cannot see your laner, or type it in the chat. do this with tracking enemy jg as well.
10) ALWAYS, and i cannot stress this enough, always help your jg. if hes in a duel HELP HIM/HER. its a free kill if you do and assist gold is still good 2.
 11) do not rage when some "ks" u. this is not kill steal but kill secure. every kill is good no matter who it goes 2. just say "lol" and move on. farm and farm some more.
12) do not give up hope. if your doing badly, ask if u can farm in someone elses lane or the jg for the time being. you will catch up dw.
now tips to help your lane 
when your enemy laner leaves, PUSH. this makes them lose ALOT of cs and you will have a slight lead. when they b, they are forfeiting money and this is your chance to punish them.
at the start of the game. at 1:55 attract the first 3 melee minions to attack u. wait until those 3 are bunched up and then run back to your minions. those melee minions will attack simultaneously and push towards your tower, forcing the enemy laner to come towards your side of the lane opening up an easy gank and kill for your team. 

this is all i have so far. i have more tips, but just cannot think of them atm and im quite tired. if this helped you then you would make me a very happy person
midnightfox
